headline: SDGE Wins Two Chartwell Awards for Excellence in Outage Operations and Communications
summary: San Diego Gas & Electric (SDGE) announced today that it has been honored with two 2025 Chartwell Best Practices Awards: the Gold Award for Excellence in Outage Operations and the Silver Award for Excellence in Outage Communications. The awards recognize SDGE's leadership in safeguarding communities during extreme weather events and advancing innovative technologies to help reduce wildfire risks and power outages.

content.title: SDGE Wins Two Chartwell Awards for Excellence in Outage Operations and Communications
content.summary: San Diego Gas & Electric (SDGE) announced today that it has been honored with two 2025 Chartwell Best Practices Awards: the Gold Award for Excellence in Outage Operations and the Silver Award for Excellence in Outage Communications. The awards recognize SDGE's leadership in safeguarding communities during extreme weather events and advancing innovative technologies to help reduce wildfire risks and power outages.

thumbnail.caption: SDGE employees coordinate closely during a training drill inside the Emergency Operations Center, demonstrating teamwork and readiness in emergency response scenarios.
